text: The 1929 Southern Conference Men's Basketball Tournament took place from March 1–March 4, 1929, at Municipal Auditorium in Atlanta, Georgia. The NC State Wolfpack won their first Southern Conference title, led by head coach Gus Tebell.Southern Conference Tournament Results. p. 6.
